Featured Artists Categories
//Paintings Astronaut In this cosmic tableau, an intrepid astronaut stands resolute upon the barren lunar surface. The moon, a monochromatic canvas of grays and ashen whites, stretches out beneath their sturdy boots. Their spacesuit, a symphony of form and function, clings to their silhouetteâ€”a protective cocoon against the void. $20
Geometric Gaze This striking image portrays a feline subject in a bold, cubist style. The cats form is composed of geometric shapes, each meticulously colored in a palette of blues, greens, and beige $20
Celestial Sentinel This captivating image depicts a feline figure set against a backdrop of celestial wonders. The cat, adorned with a collar and a third eye, gazes out with an air of wisdom and serenity. $25
Solitary Reverie This evocative painting presents a surreal and dreamlike scene. A solitary figure, silhouetted against a vibrant sunset, sits on a swing suspended within the antlers of a majestic deer. $18
Mystic Harmony This vibrant and intricate painting portrays a womans face juxtaposed with the image of a wolf. The womans gaze is both serene and enigmatic, while the wolfs intense stare suggests a primal connection to nature. $15
Serene Solitude This evocative painting depicts a solitary figure swinging from a tree branch against a backdrop of a fiery sunset. The silhouette of the figure, bathed in the warm glow of the orange and yellow hues, creates a sense of peace and tranquility. $20
